  • Constructor Details

    • Consumption

      public Consumption​(int electricityConsumptionPerRoundACTIVE, int electricityConsumptionPerRoundIDLE, int waterConsumptionPerRoundACTIVE, int waterConsumptionPerRoundIDLE, int gasConsumptionPerRoundACTIVE, int gasConsumptionPerRoundIDLE)
      Creates representation of consumption of device in active and idle state.
      Parameters:
      electricityConsumptionPerRoundACTIVE - electricity consumption per one round in active state
      electricityConsumptionPerRoundIDLE - electricity consumption per one round in idle state
      waterConsumptionPerRoundACTIVE - water consumption per one round in active state
      waterConsumptionPerRoundIDLE - water consumption per one round in idle state
      gasConsumptionPerRoundACTIVE - gas consumption per one round in active state
      gasConsumptionPerRoundIDLE - gas consumption per one round in idle state

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update​(State state)
      Updates device's consumption based on it's activity - whether it is idle or active.
      Parameters:
      state - current state od device

      Returns integer value of electricity consumption.
